TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ContainerControlDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner

summary.span: 为包含可以在设计时修改的子控件或属性的控件提供设计器功能。

span.span: Provides designer functionality for controls that contain child controls or properties that can be modified at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的可修改设计图面的控件提供设计器的基类。The class provides a base designer class for controls that can be modified on the design surface. 这包括包含可编辑的内部属性或子控件的控件。This includes controls that contain child controls or editable inner properties. 提供单个组帧的区域以表示控件，并在设计时呈现控件时自动处理。The provides a single framed region to represent the control, and automatically handles rendering the control at design time. 应用上要确定的设计时行为的关联控件的属性。Apply the attribute on the associated control to determine the design-time behavior of the . 应用设置关联的控件，如下所示：Apply the settings on the associated control as follows: - `false` 若要指示表示为子控件的可编辑的设计区域的内容。`false` to indicate that the represents the contents of the editable design region as child controls. - `true` 若要指示可编辑的设计区域的内容表示为可编辑的控件的内部属性。`true` to indicate that the represents the contents of the editable design region as editable inner properties of the control. 控件开发人员可以派生，并将自定义设计器从一个具体取决于正在开发的控件类型的几个基本设计器扩展，如以下列表中定义：Control developers can derive and extend a custom designer from one of several base designers depending on the kind of control that is being developed, as defined in the following list: - 允许在设计时添加到它的子控件的控件可以派生自类。Controls that allow child controls to be added to it at design time can derive from the class. 例如，类派生自类和表示设计图面上的控件。For example, the class is derived from the class and represents a control on the design surface. - 一个或多个子控件，并且可能具有可编辑设计器区域，在设计时添加控件的控件可以派生自类。Controls that have one or more child controls, and might also have an editable designer region where controls can be added at design time, can derive from the class. - 要求自定义设计时处理可以派生自基类的控件类。Controls that require custom design-time processing can derive from the base class. > [!NOTE] > 类替换已过时类。The class replaces the obsolete class. 使用特性将相关联以及自定义控件实现的自定义设计器类。Use the attribute to associate a custom designer class together with a custom control implementation. 有关如何使用自定义控件的控件设计器的详细信息，请参阅[演练： 为 Web 服务器控件中创建基本的控件设计器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/27e44af0-6e12-4b7d-b17f-db35f1b6a052)。For detailed information about how to use control designers with custom controls, see [Walkthrough: Creating a Basic Control Designer for a Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/27e44af0-6e12-4b7d-b17f-db35f1b6a052). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设计器从派生类类。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a designer class from the class. 该示例定义派生自的简单控件类，并将定义关联的设计器，该类派生自类。The example defines a simple control that is derived from the class, and then defines an associated designer, which is derived from the class. 派生的设计器类替代和属性，以自定义是围绕设计图面上的控件的可编辑区域的帧。The derived designer class overrides the and properties to customize the frame that is around the editable region of the control on the design surface. [!code-csharp[SimpleContainerControlDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SimpleContainerControlDesigner/CS/simplecontainercontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SimpleContainerControlDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SimpleContainerControlDesigner/VB/simplecontainercontrol.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void AddDesignTimeCssAttributes (System.Collections.IDictionary styleAttributes);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddDesignTimeCssAttributes(class System.Collections.IDictionary styleAttributes) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub AddDesignTimeCssAttributes (styleAttributes As IDictionary)
protected: virtual void AddDesignTimeCssAttributes(System::Collections::IDictionary ^ styleAttributes);

span.span: A keyed collection of style attributes.

summary.span: 在设计时添加控件的样式特性。

span.span: Adds the style attributes for the control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将添加的一组控件的设计时表示的样式特性。The method adds a set of style attributes for the design-time representation of the control. 样式特性值添加到`styleAttributes`集合，由样式属性名称进行键控。The style attribute values are added to the `styleAttributes` collection, keyed by the style attribute name. 例如，可以访问集合中作为高度值`styleAttributes["height"]`对于 C# 或`styleAttributes("height")`为 Microsoft Visual Basic。For example, you can access the height value in the collection as `styleAttributes["height"]` for C# or `styleAttributes("height")` for Microsoft Visual Basic. 如果关联的控件不派生自类，方法不会添加到的属性值`styleAttributes`集合。If the associated control is not derived from the class, the method does not add attribute values to the `styleAttributes` collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool AllowResize { get; }
.property instance bool AllowResize
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property AllowResize As Boolean
public: virtual property bool AllowResize { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示控件的大小在设计时是否可以调整。

span.span: Gets a value indicating if the control can be resized at design time.

value.span: 如果控件的大小可以调整，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: , if the control can be resized; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基实现属性返回`true`。The base implementation for the property returns `true`. 这表示设计器支持的设计图面上的控件调整大小。This indicates that the designer supports resizing of the control on the design surface.

para.span: 派生自的类类可以重写属性以指示设计器不支持重设大小的设计图面上的控件。

span.span: Classes that are derived from the class can override the property to indicate that the designer does not support resizing of the control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string FrameCaption { get; }
.property instance string FrameCaption
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property FrameCaption As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ FrameCaption { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取控件在设计时显示的标题。

span.span: Gets the caption that is displayed for a control at design time.

value.span: 如果该控件有设计时标题，则为设计时用作控件框架标题的字符串；否则为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The string used for the control frame caption at design time, if the control has a design-time caption; otherwise, an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串是显示在设计图面上的控件的可编辑区域周围的框架的标题。The string is the caption that is displayed in the frame around the editable region of the control on the design surface. 默认标题帧是的设计器的实例的属性。The default caption for a frame is the property of the designer instance. 这通常是运行时相同的控件属性。This is typically the same as the run-time property of the control.

para.span: 通过派生类，可以为控件设计器设置不同的框架标题类，以及然后重写属性。

span.span: You can set a different frame caption for a control designer by deriving a class from the class, and then overriding the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style FrameStyle { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style FrameStyle
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property FrameStyle As Style
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ FrameStyle { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取设计时应用于控件框架的样式。

span.span: Gets the style that is applied to the control frame at design time.
A for the control frame at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示的样式属性的设计图面上的控件的可编辑区域周围的框架。The property indicates the style properties of the frame around the editable region of the control on the design surface.

para.span: 派生类时类，请替代属性可以更改框架，如边框、 前景颜色、 背景色和标题字体设置的属性。

span.span: When deriving a class from the class, override the property to change the properties of the frame, such as the border, foreground color, background color, and caption font settings.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Collections.IDictionary GetDesignTimeCssAttributes ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IDictionary GetDesignTimeCssAttributes() cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetDesignTimeCssAttributes () As IDictionary
public: virtual System::Collections::IDictionary ^ GetDesignTimeCssAttributes();

summary.span: 返回控件在设计时的样式特性集合。

span.span: Returns the collection of style attributes for the control at design time.

returns.span: 一个样式特性集合，该集合应用于设计图面上的控件。

span.span: A collection of style attributes applied to the control on the design surface.

returns.span: 样式特性名是用于访问 中的样式特性值的键。

span.span: The style attribute names are keys used to access the style attribute values in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回的控件的设计时表示的样式属性的集合。The method returns a collection of style attributes for the design-time representation of the control. 若要在控件的设计时检查样式属性值，请作为键与返回的集合使用的样式属性名称。To examine a style attribute value at design time for a control, use the style attribute name as a key to the returned collection. 样式属性值存储为集合中的字符串。Style attribute values are stored as strings in the collection. 例如，可以访问集合中作为高度值`styleAttributes["height"]`对于 C# 或`styleAttributes("height")`为 Microsoft Visual Basic。For example, you can access the height value in the collection as `styleAttributes["height"]` for C# or `styleAttributes("height")` for Microsoft Visual Basic. 如果关联的控件不派生自类，方法返回一个空集合。If the associated control is not derived from the class, the method returns an empty collection.

para.span: 默认实现方法初始化使用样式属性集合方法。

span.span: The default implementation for the method initializes the style attribute collection by using the method.

para.span: 操作从派生控件设计器中的样式类，请替代方法。

span.span: To manipulate styles in a control designer that are derived from the class, override the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string GetDesignTimeHtml (System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection regions);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml(class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection regions) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml (regions As DesignerRegionCollection) As String
public: override System::String ^ GetDesignTimeHtml(System::Web::UI::Design::DesignerRegionCollection ^ regions);

span.span: A collection of designer regions.

summary.span: 返回用于在设计时表示控件的 HTML 标记。

span.span: Returns the HTML markup that is used to represent the control at design time.

returns.span: 表示控件的 HTML 标记字符串。

span.span: An HTML markup string that represents the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来获取控件的 HTML。Use the method to get the HTML for the control. 使用及其关联的控件设计器呈现的可编辑的设计区域中包含的子控件。Child controls that are contained in the editable design region are rendered using their associated control designers. 方法初始化新对象关联的控件，然后又返回的可编辑区域的区域通过`regions`集合。The method initializes a new object for the editable region of associated control, and then returns the region through the `regions` collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string GetEditableDesignerRegionContent (System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetEditableDesignerRegionContent(class System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetEditableDesignerRegionContent (region As EditableDesignerRegion) As String
public: override System::String ^ GetEditableDesignerRegionContent(System::Web::UI::Design::EditableDesignerRegion ^ region);

param.name: region
param.span: 控件内包含的可编辑设计区域。

span.span: An editable design region contained within the control.

summary.span: 返回设计时控件可编辑区域的内容。

span.span: Returns the content for the editable region of the control at design time.

returns.span: 内包含的该区域的保持的内容。

span.span: The persisted content of the region contained within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现单个的设计器区域，而不是设计器区域的集合。The class implements a single designer region instead of a collection of designer regions. 因此，`region`参数将被忽略，和方法在控件设计器中返回单个包含的设计器区域的内容。Therefore, the `region` parameter is ignored, and the method returns the content for the single designer region that is contained in the control designer.

Public Overrides Function GetPersistenceContent () As String
public: override System::String ^ GetPersistenceContent();

summary.span: 在设计时返回控件的持久内容。

span.span: Returns the persistable content of the control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回`null`，则指示类不一定保持内部内容。The method returns `null` to indicate that the class does not have persisted inner content.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void SetEditableDesignerRegionContent (System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region, string content);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void SetEditableDesignerRegionContent(class System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region, string content) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub SetEditableDesignerRegionContent (region As EditableDesignerRegion, content As String)
public: override void SetEditableDesignerRegionContent(System::Web::UI::Design::EditableDesignerRegion ^ region, System::String ^ content);

param.name: region
param.span: 控件内包含的可编辑设计区域。

span.span: An editable design region contained within the control.

param.name: content
param.span: 要为可编辑设计区域分配的内容。

span.span: Content to assign for the editable design region.

summary.span: 在设计时设置控件的可编辑区域的内容。

span.span: Sets the content for the editable region of the control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现单个的设计器区域，而不是设计器区域的集合。The class implements a single designer region instead of a collection of designer regions. 因此，`region`参数将被忽略，和方法设置控件设计器中的单个包含的设计器区域的内容。Therefore, the `region` parameter is ignored, and the method sets the content for the single designer region that is contained in the control designer.
